data.actual_result: The in-app browser opens, and the top bar is either too low, messing with the loading statusbar and other elements
data.expected_result: The browser doesn't open since you're already sliding to another view
data.short_description: In app browser is unaligned if triggered while sliding
data.steps_to_repro: - Find/Send a link in chat - Hold on the URL, and start sliding either left or right - Make sure the darkened border (that indicates a link has been tapped is still visible) - Stop tapping
